I learned that the spending framework of the Royal Decree was proposed by the council. The framework for the use of money under the old Act is intended to propose to the Council of the Commission to consider three terms.
But it appears that the opposition has decided to walk out of the conference room. It is an expression. It's a political right.

Economic problems of agricultural products. The government has paid a lot of money. Through the intervention program, each year is now hundred thousand.
But the system is not the best system. Farmers who really benefit. Not yet So we are doing a new system.
The key is to register farmers. The government is aware of how many main crops each farmer has planted in the estimated amount.
Then when the output came out. The government will help by keeping the farmers' brothers happy. And have a reasonable return.
When the output comes out, the government does not have to intervene in the market that some pledges do not pawn. The government has many goods and it has problems.
The way it is trading in the market is normal. If the price is lower than the insurance price, then get the compensation from the government. As it is registered.
If there is a pledge intervention, it will be made at a lower price than the market. To open an alternative for farmers. I decided to bring the product to market immediately. Or will be pledged.
The original purpose of pledging crop prices. This will be a picture and probably will be presented. I'm going to rush out to catch the season.
At the same time, the strategic plan of each crop. The government is accelerating its work in parallel with the investment in water resources in accordance with the strong Thai action plan.
I hope this new system will be more sustainable than in the past. And can be useful to the farmer thoroughly thoroughly.
In the world heritage. The area around the temple temple overlaps the territory of Thailand and Cambodia.
We want to see peace. See the relationship between Thailand and Cambodia. Therefore, we have taken the position here.
Relations with Cambodia Deputy Prime Minister Suthep Thaugsuban will travel to understand that what we do is not different from the talk with Cambodia.
On the subject of the border, it must be resolved according to the mechanism agreed under peaceful means.
We stand on the right side of the register of the World Heritage. Cambodia wants to do the same thing.
As we see that doing so is affecting the relationship. And there is a risk of accelerating the violence.
I think the story of this world heritage will continue to understand the way Cambodia.

I would like to emphasize that this infection rate in the country will increase one to 70-80 people, but many countries are in a similar situation to us now.
I would like to reiterate that, in fact, the mortality rate is close to that of the normal flu. Or slightly lower.
The important thing is if the symptoms are fever, cough 1-2 days and then disappear. Please rush to the hospital to help reduce the risk.
I repeat that this disease meets many countries. But let's get to the hospital soon, especially the risk group. The elderly, pregnant women who have a disease.
Who has symptoms to avoid transmission? And the general public must be careful about hygiene, such as washing hands.
